resources.string: All computers contain a central processing unit that interprets and executes instructions; input devices, such as a keyboard and a mouse, through which data and commands enter the computer.
View and modify your information and other details on your Green Leaf profile
Let the kitchen know when you will be needing to eat the pre prepared meals.
Scan the QR code while having your Meal to gain bonus Leaves!
Want to know how you compare to others? Check out how many leaves you have collected overall and be the top of the leaderboard!
Redeem your hard-earned plants for fantastic gifts to make your life more sustainable
/ The Worlds First Barista Standard 16oz Large Reusable Cup

/ This Family Pack of 4 Charcoal Teeth Whitening Toothbrushes contains 4 high quality, durable and environmentally friendly toothbrush that will get your teeth clean, restore brightness and make gums healthy without bringing any harm to the environment - unlike plastic toothbrushes.
/ The Chilly\'s Bottle keeps your drink warm for 12 hours and cool for 24 hours. It helps you stay hydrated and healthy in any environment your adventures take you.
What is Green Leaf? Green Leaf is an app to help encourage sustainable behaviour within your organisation or institution

How does it work? Green Leaf rewards user’s for letting their organisation or institution know when they will be needing lunch! Every time you submit your details for the new week ahead you will be rewarded with leaves. Collect 20 leaves and you will get a plant, and with these plants you can redeem them for amazing rewards!

Why do we need Green Leaf? With today’s society focusing on being more sustainable, it is essential that we try reduce one of the major threats that is food wastage. With Green Leaf our goal is to only prepare what we need. Not a crumb more!

Where is Green Leaf used? Green Leaf is used wherever you have meals prepared for yourself and others. Can be at your school, University halls and even your place of work. Let us know when you and are not in, then we will be able to meet our goal of creating a more sustainable environment
